website_summaries.verdict: Sophisticated, chic, and designed to entertain and impress.
pros: With just 25 pieces, assemble a sleek and practical steel and glass table for 4
Customers love the high-end design just as much as we do
And don't worry about spills because the glass top is easy to clean

website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a 5-piece glass table top set. Its light weight makes it easy to move.
pros: Glass top looks modern and makes the space look more open
cons: Smaller than many expected considering it seats 4

customer_reviews.title: Was packaged very nicely, nothing was seriously damaged just a few scratches ...
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged very nicely, nothing was seriously damaged just a few scratches on the legs. But other then that it's a very nice table for our small dining area.. Chairs are very sturdy! Overall I love it! Took about 1 hr to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glass top table / small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Very nice small glass top Dinning set , very easy to put together . Took me like one hour by myself . Easy instructions. Has a nice clean look . Chairs are very comfortable . Fits 4 people (tight).
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great table for an apartment/small place
customer_reviews.text: Great table! It’s a nice size. It’s small enough to fit in the kitchen area but not too big that it takes up tons of room, which I need. It is glass so just know it does have be cleaned often if you don’t plan on putting a table cloth over it. I have place mats and they look cute. My only complaint is the backs are uncomfortable so I have to buy some back cushions to tie so the seats are more comfortable to sit in. The seat part is fine, cushioned nice and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Peseller

customer_reviews.title: STURDY! AF
customer_reviews.text: This table is STURDY! My family isn’t the skinniest of people and we’ve had zero issues. Im talkin 300-400lb. People. I LOVE the glass table top. You can write on it with dry erase. You can paint on it. You can pretty much do anything. It is thick glass. I put this together myself in 15 minutes. The chairs went together in an hour. Easy. Good instructions. HEAVY!! I dragged this up my stairs and into the house by myself but I mean I dragged it from the driveway up the three steps and into the door myself soo. Oh and I came with 4 cute little table mats. Cool bonus
customer_reviews.author: Yentruocc

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are off
customer_reviews.text: The holes that were predrilled in the table are not correct, therefore the table cannot be assembled. While one side aligns perfectly, the other and completely off which makes the table wobbly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Liars
customer_reviews.text: They barely deserve the one star. Chairs falling apart after 5 months of use. Company reached out to give me replacement chairs but never sent the chairs. Now I have a table with no chairs. Beware not worth the money. Chairs not sturdy. Table is ok.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice for our apartment dining room. The instructions and assembly were fairly easy, but it was a little annoying to screw everything in since the base of the tables and chairs can be a little lopsided without the glass or the seats on top. Even with 2 people, it took an hour to try and get everything even. I get a little frustrated with assembling furniture but I'm glad this was worth it. The 4 stars are only due to the seats being uncomfortably stiff. I had to buy seat cushions to make them comfy. Otherwise, the set looks really lovely.
customer_reviews.author: ScrubOtakuTrash

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made for price you pay
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 4 chairs are unsteady and rock back and fourth. The actual manufacturing of the legs is uneven. When I contacted the company they tried to tell me I assembled the chairs incorrectly. The assembly took several hours and was not easy. The chair padding also looks like office waiting room chair padding. For a $200.00 table, I would have expected something more sturdy and of better quality. I am very disappointed in my purchase of this table.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Margaritis

customer_reviews.title: Great table for medium sized areas
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my medium sized kitchen and it fits well. Table and chairs assembly was pretty easy, and I enjoy the modern look, however the bolts that come with the table are cheap, so make sure to put it together properly the first time because the bolts will most likely strip and you will have a hard time getting them off. I suggest lightly tightening the bolts together on the chairs first to make sure they are all in place, then fully tighten them. I ran into an issue with one of the chairs where one of the bolts wouldn't fit properly because I had tightened all of the other bolts fully first.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small table. We do not eat in our kitchen very often and there was not much room for a table in there. This table has worked out great for our quick breakfasts. I would not buy for a main family table for regular sit down meals. The table is fairly sturdy but I imagine it will be a year or so before the chairs start getting wiggly, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Not a dining table
customer_reviews.text: Extremely little table so I use it as a computer desk for my bedroom...it will not work for a family of 4
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble (mostly), good size and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primariy for playing board games. It will be great for that while not taking up too much space. Seating for four does look a little tight. The glass table top looks nice. The place mats were included. The table is very easy to assemble. The chairs were a little awkward solo but manageable until the cushions. Lining them up and getting them screwed it was very frustrating. Arrived on time and the only damage I saw was one of the chair backs had a dent in it. As others have noted, the price really couldn't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Sand

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but difficult to build
customer_reviews.text: If your'e used to building flatpack furniture, and you know what you're doing, you should have no problem. It's an excellent dining set, looks classy, astounding considering the price. That being said, I wrestled with the chairs, but three out of the four I was unable to fix so that their legs were even: they rock back and forth to this day. This may just be my incompetence - I'm hardly an experienced handyman - but all the rest of my furniture was from IKEA, and I had no similar issues with those items, so I'm inclined to think the product is somewhat to blame. Nevertheless, like I said, if you're a flatpack veteran, you'll probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: thisisanaccount

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table, was not difficult to build (took time though, we had our handyman do it), Right after we bought the table, we realized that one of the chairs were missing cap- we reached out to the seller who responded right away and sending new caps to us via express shipping. Great customer service. We had the table for already quite a bit now and we are very pleased, for a table/chairs set at this price point, it is very sturdy (we have two active kids), it looks very presentable and fits our kitchen very well. we highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend seat cushions because mine are already damaged and stained ...
customer_reviews.text: this arrives in multiple pieces. as im putting it together, i notice just about every piece has a ding or bend somewhere on it. EVERY PIECE! i had already put half of it together and it was really inexpensive so i didn't want to go thru the hassle of returning it. Also, the wood itself is very very cheap, i highly recommend seat cushions because mine are already damaged and stained and ive only had these 2-3 months. but i would not recommend this product to anyone. fork out the extra 100 and get a better table.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality table at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table set! Directions were very easy to follow and was actually fun to put together. The parts came well protected and It comes with all the necessary hardware and a tool is included. The table is very sturdy and the chairs are comfortable. The place mats that come with it top it right off. It looks very nice, just like in the pictures. I purchased this for my 2 bedroom apartment and its the perfect size. Im very pleased with the quality and price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: DVo

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy table to ship
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time ordering this. The first time it never showed up, apparently UPS damaged it. The second time I received it 3 days later. Yay!! However one of the screws in the chair was stripped. The table is slightly cracked. It's very minuscule but it does worry me about the future. The table itself is small but cute. Very easy to build, it took me about 45 minutes total. I needed a basic small table and its exactly what I needed, minus the headache getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy table, but bad packaging, missing bolts
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this table. She finds it very cute and it fits perfectly in our small dining room area. The reason I docked a star is because of packaging and two missing bolts. The box was pretty roughed up and torn in some places when it arrived, but fortunately nothing was broken or bent. After opening the box, there were several loose bolts throughout. This was due to a hole in one of the hardware bags. I only deducted one star since the two missing bolts went to one of the chairs we aren't using yet, and they can be easily replaced by a visit to a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: FoReVeR

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, items thrown into Box like garbage
customer_reviews.text: I had to go through the total pain of returning this nightmare The Box arrived with pieces poking through the box, and there were parts missing on top of this so there was no way to put it together. The hassle of repacking and hauling the box back to be returned was just a nightmare experience too
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price range
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set for a while now and it's solid enough, but you really need some seat cushions with these chairs, they are not comfortable to use beyond 5-10 minutes. The table tends to wobble a bit when cleaning the glass top and when I put the chairs together during assembly, some of the screw holes were misaligned. It does look nice from a distance but the set does have flaws like the ones I've already mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: spicygamethunder

customer_reviews.title: Very good table I like it
customer_reviews.text: A really nice and very comfortable dining table for 4-6 people. I really like the glass tables. This makes the house a really beautiful shape. On a high level I have to say that the shipment was quick and good and the assembly was not complicated for one person in one hour. I like the visibility of the table but one thing I was a bit disappointed about is that after I put the table up I saw that there were small scratches on the glass and I put it really gently. The chairs are also a little hard and that's why I will rank 4 stars. But thank you for making me happy
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Nice set...
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to put together! Looks very nice but I think the quality could have been alittle better.. some points of welding were very obvious thru out the set--yes the metal can scratch easily, but touch-ups can be a real easy fix..fits nicely in my small kitchen....if you have the case of chair wobbles, loosen all screws and redo them alittle at a time vs one screw to the next...love how it fits nicely in my small kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews are negative because it's a small table, it's PERFECT for us! Me and 2 children fit wonderfully in this thing! <3 I was pleasantly surprised to see that it came with the place mats because I didn't pay attention and thought they were separate. It was super easy to assemble, seems to be pretty sturdy - I will try to remember to update after a few months of being abused by crazy children, as to how it is holding up. This is a GREAT dining set if you want something small and pretty! I love it so far! Also, couldn't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Viggins

customer_reviews.title: Nice small table for breakfast area
customer_reviews.text: The table is small, but if you are considering purchasing this table hopefully you will read the dimensions and measure for what you need. Pretty simple. The item arrived in pretty good shape, but one of the seats to the chair had a stripped metal part so I am unable to tighten the seat to the metal base, but I contacted the company and fingers crossed for the replacement piece. Other than that, I'm pretty happy with purchase. Easy to put together and looks good. Would buy again. **Update** Customer service expedited the shipping of the damaged piece and it is on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly dissatisfied with this for many reasons. One being that the chairs are hard to assemble because the holes don’t alone with the base for The chairs which affects the screws going in. So some chairs don’t have all 4 screws in. Then as you can see in the photos attached. The base for the tables one of them are bent on either ends. So I can’t even set up the table. I’m just not understanding how you send products already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rema

customer_reviews.title: Glass Exploded
customer_reviews.text: The table worked as advertised for about a year and a half and then randomly the glass top literally exploded all over my apartment. Granted it was a cold day and the table was about 5 feet from a window but not something I would expect out of an indoor glass table top. I would steer away from this table.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are horrible
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this table set. I like the dining table, it's simple and does it's job. The chairs however, are garbage. Two of the four chairs have distorted within a few months after having normal sized (140lb) people sit in them for 20 minutes a day. They wobble like crazy, and one of them has had a support brace fall off of the bottom. The material is not quality and it makes me worry for the massive slab of glass in my dining room resting on the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the box very, very badly damaged and many pieces were missing - it took a back and forth with customer service over the course of a few weeks to finally get all of the right pieces (and even then they weren't totally right, but I just made do with what I received). It was honestly a miracle that the glass hadn't shattered. It's sleek when put together, but a little wobbly. The chairs and table feel like they won't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Azeem

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Only thing is where you sit I wish the bars weren’t so low. Sometimes I feel like I can’t fit in there or do anything with my legs because no room. Pretty easy to assemble took me about an hour and a half by myself. I’m sure with someone else that time would be cut in half. Beautiful table after complete set up, just the bars being too low where the chairs fit made me give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: breanna

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a Great product.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with this purchase. Great price. Easy to put together. When seated it is comfortable. The placemats are a great finishing touch. The table is durable, not shaky. Looks exactly as shown. Fits perfectly in my little kitchen area. I'm satisfied to the utmost. Took about 15 to 20 minutes to put together. Wish I could add a photo. But I dont see that option. Highly recommended for small kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Feels cheap. The welds lack luster. Seems like a 5 year old did it. Numerous parts were bent & dented. It’s also a very short table, definitely not for the dining room. Update. Customer service contacted me & made sure I was happy & taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was super fast. My husband and I just got married and moved into our first place together and we have nothing. I just wanted something simple yet affordable. It arrived today, mind u I placed my order on Sat 3/9 and it came Friday 3/15. Very easy to put together *i assembled it by myself* no missing part, the glass is very sturdy and it’s beautiful. Plus I received free placemats as a gift. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mymyitsjessica

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, good value, good for small to medium apartments
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the photo, this set is very neat. I really liked the color and the style. It also comes with four pieces of table cloth which is awesome. Very easy to install. You might notice some wobbling of the chairs but once you sit on it it’s as sturdy as it can get so no complaints. Overall pretty good value and again love the style!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this table today and it only took me about an hour to put it together! We’re in love with it, it’s just my boyfriend and i with our 1 year old in our home so this size was absolutely perfect! For the price it looks very elegant, found one almost the same at a furniture store just slightly larger for $299 with $70 shipping. This one however fits better in my home. Forgot to add I’m not a heavy girl at all only weigh 113 and after my first time sitting one of the screws came lose, they were pretty hard to get in there to me.
customer_reviews.author: Esmi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap furniture done right. Nice quality. SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs went together easily, and they're very nice built quality, although keep in mind, this is cheap furniture, you're not going to fool anyone at a fancy dinner party. When you look close, the welds look like cheaper furniture, and the chairs are very light. And the set is very small... definitely more suitable for two adults, not four. It's too small to fit for four standard placemats. I love it though. It takes up very little space... more floor space for my 4 year old to play. I had to add some velcro stickers to two of the table legs to prevent wobbling, which I have no issue with.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this was great for the price! It’s really sturdy and has a touch of elegance. It also come with 4 place mats and they are great quality. I love my dining table. My dining area is pretty small and this makes my dining area look large lol. The seats are a bit hard when you sit on it since there’s no comfort which is ok with me, I will just buy chair cushions! Overall easy to build, didn’t take that long either! I love it, completely worth it! Seriously it’s great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: We love our little table!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER EASY to assemble! Its just me so simplicity is key! The table top was not too heavy and I was able to put things together with a toddler and 10 year old running around within about 2 hours! The most daunting point was getting a screw into the last chair it just wouldn't go in right (but I tighten it as far as it could go)! This table fits nicely in our dining/living room area and is a good addition to our new apartment! I brought this awhile ago (but never had a chance to actually use it)!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBearJazzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Table is very nice and as stated by others chairs are hard and need cushion seats. For the price this was perfect for my needs. Instructions were clear and hardware was nicely packaged. I was able to assemble the table and chairs in 2 hours with the little tool that was included. The key to assembly was fully understanding the instructions. I took 15m to peruse the instructions and made sure I knew which screw went where. I had to contact vendor as I was missing a few plastic caps from the frame. 6 stars for the excellent customer service. I emailed them my issue and Judy promptly replied with missing parts mailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: song

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter table set most optimized for apartments. I got this for my dining room area. It was a pain to put it together. Every part needs to be screwed in. The chair material seems so so but I havent had any issues. The really nice thing is the glass table top. The glass is tempered and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mavin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought but great table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to replace an ugly huge table we had. It is smaller then I thought but since it’s just 2 adults and 1 tween it works fine for our family. I wasn’t certain if the chairs had cushions on them or not but I’m happy to say they are solid plastic. My cats would tear them up if there was padding. Easy enough setup, no missing parts although one chair only had 3 holes to screw into not 4, no biggie since it held sturdy with 3 screws. Chairs do t wobble and glass came in perfect.
customer_reviews.author: IzziJ

customer_reviews.title: NICE SURPRISE!
customer_reviews.text: When this set was assembled, I was honestly pleasantly surprised by the quality and appearance for this price. I mean, how is that done? The chair seats are hard, but a small cushion fixes that. Neither my husband nor have a skill set for putting things together, but our trusty handyman had it together in less than an hour, at a cost of $75 -- well worth it to us! It's perfect in our small kitchen. This is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: gerri johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice small table
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny that this comes with 4 placemats bc it takes up the whole table lolol. Love it and it’s perfect for my husband and I but it is small if you’re planning on using it for more than two people on a regular basis. Love it though, the price was incredible, and it’s great if you don’t have a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: vighper

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like how this set looks but after two months the screws seem to be coming lose and one of the chairs is bent and the bottom cap of one leg fell off. Because the chairs are metal I occasionally get an electric discharge, just a heads up. Decent for a rental apartment, but if you’re looking for something permanent - this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy to put together and great starter or eat in set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for a family member who just moved into their own place. It was really nice, easy to put together and inexpensive. The packaging was great but was not a one person lift. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawkins Family

customer_reviews.title: I;m pissed!
customer_reviews.text: There is a special tool (which was not included) its not a hex, I don't know what it is! So it sits diasanembled in my dinning space till I can fiqure out what driver to use! The instructions suck I could not afford theassebly (I bet they have the special tool) I can't give an adequte review in its present state
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about ordering a glass table off Amazon, but when it arrived all pieces were there and nothing broken.. I love this table. It's smaller then I thought, but I did see other reviews saying it's made for small apartments. Personally I think even tho it's a lil smaller then I thought it's still a good size, and fits perfect. Very solid table, chairs r good too. Very happy with my purchase, shipped fast too...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OOPS...Butt they covered their bottoms!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is what it looks like online...a small table with 4 chairs and skinny metal legs...not for leaning back on the back legs, but sturdy enough for occasional use. What elevated this to 5 🌟 was the customer support...when I went to assemble the chairs, none of the 4 wooden seat bottoms were present... I emailed customer support and the issue was resolved within a week!! Mistakes get made...it's how you respond to them that makes the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Space Table & Chairs
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to assemble and good looking dining table. It's definitely not a full size table, but for 2 adults it's more than enough. The chairs are very sturdy and the seat is HDF (not real wood). The table was absolutely a breeze to put together. The only tool you need is the allen wrench that comes with it, no drill or screwdriver required.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Minagil

customer_reviews.title: I love what I got
customer_reviews.text: I love this dining set more and more each day when I see how elegant and sheek it looks sitting in my dinning area. Coincidentally it goes perfectly well with my lighting which is silverish gray. It fits the bill, to say the least, if you are budget conscious like myself. The table and chairs are slim and sleek, but they are sturdy and very well built. They would work especially well for petttite or medium size dining area. If you prefer cozy seats, all you need is getting some seat cushions. I had a slight shipment issue and received top-notch customer services from both Amazon and VECELO. I hope you are happy shopper and customer like I am.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This would have been much easier to put together and set up if the holes were all drilled properly. The seats are uncomfortable and will require chair cushions. It doesn't look as cheap as it seems which is a nice bonus, as are the free placemats that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: take your time assembling it.
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to assemble, i found it worked best if you put the frame for the table together first and then put the glass on after you have it placed where you want it. the glass is very heavy. i only had one chair be a little wobbly, the rest assembled just fine.
customer_reviews.author: slider57

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table perfect for a small dining area
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table and fit perfectly in our small apartment! I read the reviews about scratches on the glass and was worried but ordered the table anyway because the price was tempting. We had no scratches on the glass or the table itself but minor ones on the chair legs. Chair legs aren’t silver looking like the table but they’re grey and look just fine, the scratches aren’t noticeable. Overall great sturdy table for an amazing price but don’t expect amazing quality for what it costs. It’s obviously a bit fragile and won’t last you 40 years as you should expect, because it’s not what you’re paying for. We’re very happy with what we got
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: We were totally blown away with how nice this table and chairs are. It even comes with matching place mats. For the price, it is a tremendous bargain. The parts were all finished well, easy to put together and very comfortable to use. I'd give it a 6 Star rating if they let me.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Wartinbee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Love the look that this table offers. It is small but perfect for the space i have. Kids can be very messy. So to prevent spills and etc in the main dinning room, I wanted a small "children's" table for when guests are over. It works as intended. I planned on putting the table set in storage until needed but due to the look and feel that it offers I decided it goes great where i put it.
customer_reviews.author: j.shipman

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small kitchen set for my small kitchen, and this one is pretty nice. It comes completely un-assembled, but putting it together was easy enough. It's fairly sturdy and look good. The table is nicer than the chairs, but that OK. For the price I paid, it was worth the money. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered but good so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black set originally but was sent the silver by mistake. I called Amazon about it and instead of going through the steps to send it back & reorder, I just decided to keep it. So far I'm okay with my choice, even though the black set was $5 more (for whatever reason). Putting it together was pretty simple only found two or three little spots that either had imperfections, bends or marks on it. I think I will buy seat cushions as the silver set is a little firm on the buttocks without it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jalesa

customer_reviews.title: Great Elegant Table
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's small but it's big enough for me and my family. It's really elegant and sturdy. I have no complaints at all. I was expecting to see some scratches dents or some defect because of how cheap it is but nope.. Its perfect. Im remodeling my house to give it a more modern look and this is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: mocha30

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a dining room table
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a dining room table! We wanted something cheap and more modern then your typical wood looking ones. This one is that and at a great price. Only reason for four stars is the welding on the chairs is a little shotty but you only notice when you're putting it together. For the price if your looking for an alternative to the usual tables this is it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is soooo cute. For the price, you get a lot. To do everything it took me about 2 hours to get everything done but it wasn’t as hard as the other reviews made it seem. I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Noelys

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the picture
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived finally after waiting for 2 months I assembled it and I thought I was going to have a tea party with my children. It’s small and it’s not sturdy it wobbles and my 3yr old son fell through the chair and hit his chin as he was sitting down. It’s not child proof so if you have little ones beware. So discussed. I didn’t even want to go through the trouble for a refund I just sat it out on the curb for garbage pick up
customer_reviews.author: JLL Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy glass table with four comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy glass table with four comfortable chairs. Perfect size for small spaces and apartment. Only reason why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, is because one of the chair cushion holes where it gets mounted onto the chair. Wasn’t drilled in correctly, so I have one chair with only three screws holding the cushion onto the chair instead of four.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's price
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get put together and the table isn't very wide so its hard to have a centerpiece. However, its very sturdy. Ive had it for almost a year and theres not even a scratch on it and I have a toddler as well as 2 nephews and a niece who are very young. The table is a common play spot. The chairs have no signs of wear either other than a paint stain. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great dining set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for a small dining room. My husband put it together with no issues. The chairs are light weight so they won't scratch the floor while moving them. Overall a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking small set- mostly small width, not length.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Nice small table and chairs. Very nice for my small apartment. Amazed at the quality considering the cheap price. Tempered glass. Chairs were a little harder to assemble, but vertainly not difficult. The screw holes where you attach the seat to the chair were obviously drilled after the seat was upholstered. This made it a little difficult to thread the screw into. I finally gave up on one. But the seat is still safe. I would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: BLBA

customer_reviews.title: A good option for me those low on space and on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived looking like it passed through Iraq and Afghanistan. I was shocked to find the glass tabletop in one piece. The “free” placemats were nowhere to be found. Assembly was tedious but not difficult. Overall, it’s fine for what it is. It’s a very affordable and small dining set. It meets my needs and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy table for small area
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new condo and this little table fits perfect. It has a simple design which i like and does the job I need. If you’re looking for a full sized table this is not for you. Perfect for the smaller spaces. Very sturdy as well. The item was packaged well which is important with the breakable pieces. Good price too, I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Brouca

customer_reviews.title: I like it. And it’s small
customer_reviews.text: I like it it’s cute! Took me a billion years to assemble because I kept doing stuff like using the wrong screws or not lining it up right with the holes, ugh. Took about 3 hours to do. Easy enough for one person to do. Box is heavy enough for two people to carry. Package came beat up but the product remains fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mayflowar

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, But still a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw the fourth chair away because of an inside piece that a screw went into was titled too far in. Couldn’t get the screw to hook. Luckily I live alone, and didn’t have space for all four chairs anyway. Still it’s disappointing. Also the table itself is sturdy the chairs are a little less sturdy. But the value is great for the price I paid. Overall I’m a happy customer. It was also very easy to assemble. Took me an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small eating area in kitchen!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you seller I love the table and 4 place mats are great quality ! Sturdy little table for 4 . Easy to put together goes fast and came packed well no damage nothing missing all in all a great buy , would buy again with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My only issues are that some of the chair pieces aren't completely symmetrical when you screw them together, but you can't notice it unless you look carefully and no metal chairs are going to match perfectly. Very nice set, pretty easy to assemble in about 30 minutes to 1 hour with basic tools. It looks very nice just like the pictures. I'm very happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine table. It is easy to put together... but the instructions aren't great. If you are a person who needs them, you may struggle. It is also pretty much impossible to have it aligned as to not wobble. That is referring to the table and the chairs. It looks pretty good in the dining room, but I cant help but feel like it would be more suited as patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gumm

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I put them together pretty fast and they look good for the price. I was missing some parts when it came in and I sent a msg to the seller... got the missing parts plus a few extra and they came super fast too... some houses don't have a dining room and have a eat in kitchen... this set is perfect for that...
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table
customer_reviews.text: It’s on the small side so perfect for apartments and small eat in kitchens. It wasn’t that hard to put together but I’m not a mechanical person so it was a little tedious. But overall I love it. It looks great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: JaiJai

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: This dining table set came in an undamaged box and took 1 1/2 hours for 2 people to assemble. The end product is the perfect size for my apartment and the glass top is gorgeous. I would recommend buying seat cushions as the chairs are pretty hard. Everything is in perfect condition and adds a modern touch to my apartment. The price is very good, as it is reasonably priced and looks expensive. Highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Overall great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college apartment. It’s not too small but also not too big. I put it together all by myself also it wasn’t hard just time consuming. The chairs and table are also sturdy. Really great price for the table I love it and I use the placemats it came with for free.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Fioto Jr

customer_reviews.title: Cute but damaged
customer_reviews.text: As I was putting together I noticed bunch of marks and scratches.. two chairs feet are not level since they were crushed during the shipping.. Amazon didn't care of my issue..
customer_reviews.author: JadeEmperor

customer_reviews.title: Nice table,  easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour using the provided Allen tool and my own electric screw driver. Package of screws could be marked better, but if you pay attention and don't mix the sizes it was easy to put together. Just dont tighten all screws until you have others started or lining up the holes becomes a drag.
customer_reviews.author: BPTIDEFAN

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: This table came so fast- didn’t come damaged at all. I’ve had it about 2 months now and it’s still just as sturdy as the day I put it together. It’s the perfect size for my 1 bedroom apartment.i only doc it one star on “easy assembly” because my hand hurt after the million of screws I had to screw in. 😂 other than that a really solid cute table!
customer_reviews.author: Sam ❤️

customer_reviews.title: ... only be lined up with the pre-drilled holes with great difficulty and needed lots up pushing and pulling
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very time consuming since most of the 16 screws for the seat parts could only be lined up with the pre-drilled holes with great difficulty and needed lots up pushing and pulling. Otherwise, the set is acceptable, the glass top actually nice. It does not look very sturdy to me but might serve my purpose for an occasional use. Overall, you get what you pay for, but I took the risk and consider it fair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Table is fine, two chairs broken after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set last year and two chairs decided to break this year. One broke in May and another one broke a minute before I wrote this review. The way two chairs broke was to falling apart. The first chair fell apart completely, many metal sticks broke apart. I like to lean on the chair but I am only about 160 lbs. I almost fell to the ground today when two metal sticks broke on the back of the chair when I was leaning on them.
customer_reviews.author: Yueyang Huang

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table that brightens up my shabby little apartment! :)
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 680-square foot apartment and wanted a table for the longest time. I was a bit nervous about buying a table online and I am very happy that I made this purchase! It is an affordable sturdy little glass table with silver chairs. I added pictures: the vase is from Walmart, the chair cushions are from IKEA, and the rug under the table is from QVC.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Glass table is very nice to look at, but everything else needs work
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glass table, with poor quality design. One of my chairs leaks air when you sit on it. The other chair has a metal piece that keeps moving on the back of the chair. The chair design isn't so comfortable, but the table itself is a very nice table. I give 3 starts because the glass table is awesome, but this product loses 2 stars because everything else is just very low quality
customer_reviews.author: yar Law

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely amazing product. Not only is the price amazing, but it's very modern and perfect for four or less people. I live in an apartment and this fits perfectly. (Even great for a house if there are four of you.) It is tempered glass, the chairs are relatively comfortable and my husband didn't have much trouble putting it together. Looks wonderful and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Stu the Janitor

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain in the @ss to put together but it was worth it in the end I guess. Arrived perfect - no dents, scratches, etc. It's a pretty small table, but if you're in a small apartment it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent table. Looks amazing! Seems strudy enough. Instructions weren't the easiest to understand i had to repeat a few steps. i think it wouldve been easier with help. Nice small table for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Raya P

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but.......
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this table. I got this because another table from another company came in a thousand pieces. This one is so much nicer. I put it together in 45 minutes but....one bolt in 2 chair cushions would not bolt in. I worked at that for one hour and finally gave up. I still highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: foundalodar

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Super cute table. Great for small spaces.. However, the holes that were made are not precise. While assembling the table, there was one screw that wasnt working which is frustrating. I wish it was fixable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Though the product did have a few defects and issues when it originally arrived, the company responded swiftly to rectify the issue. I'm happy with the look and construction of the product. The construction though minimalist seems sturdy and we have not had any issues. This table fits perfectly in my tiny NYC apt. and though not heirloom quality furniture seems like it will last at least until we move into a larger space The customer service of this company is 2nd to none
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain table and chairs set
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful. I'm still moving in to my new house. So it's cluttered with bags, tools etc. I'll take a picture when the weather is nice enough to bring my boxes inside. My main project is installing curtain rods etc. I've been using the chairs as stepping stools to help around the house. Those are sturdy too. I bought cushions for the chairs to make them more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: My dining area is very small in my condo and this set perfectly fit the space! That said, the table is very small and the chairs are pretty low to the ground so keep that in mind when making the purchase. It's quite sturdy and was easy to put together though it did take me a little while to do so. All in all I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate G.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in small space I have. Thought I would only fit 2 chairs but this set allowed for 4. I didn’t put together but friend who did said it took around 30 minutes. I imagine it would have taken me twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Taubman

customer_reviews.title: Small, sturdy dining table
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well packaged, no items were missing or damaged. Easy to assemble (approximately 1 hour for 4 chairs and the table) using nothing more than the allen key / tool provided. Table and chairs are both sturdy with no wobbles or shakes, however when it comes to comfort, the padding on the chairs is quite thin (only reason to deduct 1 star). Great small dining table -- it is the right size for 2 adults and 2 children. I would not recommend for 4 adults. Its possible but would be very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this. Budget was tight, wanted something easy to clean that wouldn’t scratch (thus glass top). It’s light weight with exception of the glass top. Bought little cushions for the chairs at Walmart. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Severely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two tables. First, the color on the ad shows a silver/chrome color, shiny. However, the product that was shipped was more of a brushed nickel color, very matte, and not shiny at all. Second, almost every piece was scratched. Third, one piece had a huge dent in it (see photo). Finally, one corner of one of the tables was chipped (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Darcy L Kasner

customer_reviews.title: JUST BEAUTIFUL & SOLID
customer_reviews.text: SOLID GLASS TABLE, CHAIRS FEEL GREAT, WAS SIMPLE AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE, THIS TABLE IS PERFECT FOR SMALL QUARTERS IN A KITCHEN AREA OR SETTINGS, LOOKS BEAUTIFUL, TOO. ALSO COMES WITH TABLE MATS X4. THIS TABLE WOULD BE IDEAL FOR 2-3 PEOPLE TO EAT COMFORTABLY. I'M VERY HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: ALWAYZ BELIEVE : )

customer_reviews.title: The worst product on amazon !
customer_reviews.text: Above all, don't buy! it is a table for dolls, but tall dolls! it is very small on the surface, you can just eat for 2 people, but much too high for an average adult. Assembly is difficult because the holes for the screws are badly machined. This set is ARCHI VOID! We kept it, because it was too difficult to repack everything to return, but above all, don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Table is ok, chairs are horrible and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The table is high quality glass and looks great, although it’s a little low, but the chairs are horrible quality. Some of the support pieces came snapped off, and after assembling them they are child sized, not adult sized, and are so wobbly and unstable that I had to get rid of them and go get new chairs from Wal-Mart. If you’re looking for a clean, minimalist glass table, it’s worth checking out, but don’t bother with the dangerous and laughably small chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Morrissette

customer_reviews.title: I will be using this set a long time
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with size. The chairs look like they sit low but feel very comfortable for shorter people. The table top has been very durable so far. The placemats that are included I expected to throw out. As it turns out they lay very nicely on the table and have an attractive sheen to them. All in all its a great little set that is just the right size and look for my small space. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L. Lovatt

customer_reviews.title: Good For Its Price
customer_reviews.text: its really cute and small witch is what I wanted in liked it in black but I went with the silver because of the solid chairs. One of the chairs is defective (missing thread piece). witch is fine I only needed the three anyway will update in about a month to see how well it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute small table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small table for a small dining room! It fits perfectly in my dining room/kitchen. Building the table was ok, the instructions could have been a little clearer. I don’t know if the chairs will last, they don’t seem that stable but they’re great for now. Update: After about two months, I noticed one of the chairs has a little rip. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Milam

product_meta.title: VECELO Dining Table with 4 Chairs [4 Placemats Included, Black
feature_bullets: Sturdy Table Top: 7mm tempered glass to greatly increase lifespans [4 Placemats Included ]
Reliable Structure: Steel tube structure to provide strong support for your tableware
Easy Cleanup: All the mess will be finished in one single wipe, convenient
Fast Assembly: Installation needs little time with provided instructions.Supports up to 200lbs weight

Practical: Table 43.3(L)*27.5(W)*30(H), Chair 15.7(L) * 16.9 (W)*33.8 (H), Perfect for small dining areas / playing card / board games. Warranty: 5 years warranty and friendly customer support, email us when you need any help

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,354 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Chair seat chair back, Chair legs, Tempered glass top, Nuts and screws, Table legs
